nl.weeaboo.vn.text

Interface ITextRenderState

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IMultiLineText, IText, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ITextDrawable, ITextRenderer

    public interface ITextRenderState
extends IMultiLineText, java.io.Serializable
    Shared functionality between ITextRenderer and ITextDrawable.
